div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 715 Thrace ?, 1910-1911 (1106) Burial: c. 385-375 B.C. (T) Contents: 23+ AR Abdera: 11 st.; 3 dr.; 2 diob. Maroneia: 7 st. Disposition: dispersed. Egger Cat. Jan. 15, 1912, nos. 126-32, 134, 148-54 West, NNM 40 (1929), pp. 84-9 May, Abdera, p. 191 The find came on the market at Drama; it- provenance is unknown but the cons tents suggest Thrace
